item.title: Rare wildflowers blanket Atacama desert
item.description: One of the world's driest deserts is transformed into a sea of wildflowers after a rare bloom.

item.title: Icebreakers and golf spark Trump and Finnish leader's unlikely friendship
item.description: Alexander Stubb has become a key voice for Europe at the White House amid the Ukraine war.

item.title: Denmark to boost Greenland defence with new ships, jets and HQ
item.description: Denmark will buy US F-35 fighter jets and new ships to defend Greenland - a resource-rich Danish territory that President Trump wants to control.

item.title: Trump administration starts laying off thousands of workers
item.description: More than 4,000 workers across seven agencies will receive notices that their jobs are being cut, the government disclosed in a court filing.

item.title: 'They treated us like animals' - Inside the epicentre of deportations in New York City
item.description: Chaotic scenes have become routine in a federal immigration court in Manhattan.
